title: I got pax sivir and i havent received neo pax sivir yet
body:
Soooo  got pax sivir in my EUNE account and i havent received neo pax sivir yet.Its 15:09pm here.
When i am gonna get it

replies.body: We're still a few hours away from the [Epic Capsules](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/neo-pax-sivir-and-epic-capsules) event, so she's not available just yet.  We haven't' distributed Neo Pax Sivir to players yet who already own the original.  Hang tight and the goodies will come!

>The new Epic Capsules have an increased chance to drop the Neo PAX Sivir skin shard

"Increased chance". Increased from what? What's the baseline percentage here?

Btw, a question:

>If you don’t find an answer, drop your question into the comments and we’ll try to get it sorted.

~~http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/rewards-old-honor-are-rolling-out-30/9~~
http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/rewards-old-honor-are-rolling-out-9/30

I interpret that as there will be Reds present in the EUNE comment section as well, but...they are almost always never there, despite this "promise". 

I'm not pinning this on you, sir, but I'd like to see some officials in all regions, especially when the equivalent of a promise is being made. And _someone_ should be held to that. 

It's a matter of trust.
